segments.text: I see that woman standing at the sink, totally absorbed in her dish.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s a peaceful, almost serene image at first glance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But then I notice the water flowing over the edge, creating a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not be aware of it?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is already in the puddle, and yet she keeps drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then there's the boy, reaching for cookies like it’s a game.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can hardly bear to watch; that stool is so wobbly!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the girl beside him looks so eager, as if she’s cheering him on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's amusing, yet so terrifying at the same time.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't shake the feeling that something will go wrong any second now.
segments.speaker: PAR
